name: Finnish Water Utilities Association
membership: FIWA is a member of EurEau: http://eureau.org/
goal: Finnish Water Utilities Association (FIWA) is the co-operation and member association of the Finnish water and wastewater utilities. Our main purpose is to facilitate an enabling operational environment for our member utilities and support their functions. FIWA works alongside policy makers in Finland and the EU.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Pieces of legislation and policies effecting the water sector, the most important ones being Water Framework Directive, Drinking Water Directive, Urban Waste Water Directive.

FIWA is also interested in pieces of legislation and policies on sectors that have a potential impact on the water sector, such as energy, finance and economics, infrastructure, agriculture etc.
